Barrla Kiosks are managed through the Kiosks Terminals Management Portal or KTM portal.

The KTM provides complete end-to-end solution with a decoupled architecture and can manage & host multi tenancy services centrally and provides accessibility via the assisted and non assisted terminals.

Barrla Systems Management application software allows users to register & manage all kiosks terminals, Configure Services, manage languages & deployment of Advertising screens on the terminals via Cloud.
The statuses of terminals can also be changed [Shutdown / Restart / Power off & On] from the Cloud.

The Monitoring application is scalable and can monitor other terminals that provide information via XFS-SNMP protocol.
Various reports can be configured & shared that can be viewed by respective reporting heads.
